00034 require_once("../../include.inc.php");

00036 if (isset($_POST['rule']) && ($_POST['rule'] == 'add')) {
00037     $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->addRule($_POST['addrulenumber']);
00038     header ("Location: filteredit.php?rulenumber=". $_POST['addrulenumber']);
00039 }
00040 
00041 if (isset($_POST['anchor']) && ($_POST['anchor'] == 'add')) {
00042     $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->addRule($_POST['addanchor']);
00043     header ("Location: anchoredit.php?action=filter&rulenumber=". $_POST['addanchor']);
00044 }
00045 
00046 if (isset($_POST['comment']) && ($_POST['comment'] == 'add')) {
00047     $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->addRule($_POST['addcomment']);
00048     header ("Location: commentedit.php?action=filter&rulenumber=". $_POST['addcomment']);
00049 }

00051 if (isset($_GET['up'])) {
00052     $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->up($_GET['up']);
00053     reload();
00054 }

00056 if (isset($_GET['down'])) {
00057     $_SESSION['pfw']->filter->down($_GET['down']);

00063     reload();

00067 foreach ($_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules as $rule) {
00068     if (array_key_exists("direction", $rule)) {
00069         $has_direction = '1';
00070     }
00071     if (array_key_exists("comment", $rule) && $rule['type'] != 'comment') {
00072         $has_comment = '1';
00073     }
00074 }
00075 
00076 $active = "filter";
00077 page_header("filter");
00078 ?>
00079 <div id="main">
00080 <h2>Rules</h2>
00081 <table>
00082     <tr>
00083         <th>No</th>
00084         <th>Type</th>
00085         <?php if ($has_direction) { ?>
00086         <th>Direction</th>
00087         <?php } ?>

00101     <?php
00102     $rulenumber = '0';
00103     foreach ($_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules as $rule) {
00104       if ($rulenumber%2) {
00105         print "<tr class=\"even\">\n";
00106       } else {
00107         print "<tr>\n";
00108       }
00109       print "\t<td>". $rulenumber. "</td>\n";
00110         if ($rule['type'] == 'comment') {
00111             print "\t<td class=\"comment\" colspan=\"";
00112             print ('10' + $has_direction + $has_comment). "\">". nl2br(stripslashes($rule['comment'])). "</td>\n";
00113         }   else {
00114             print "\t<td class=\"". $rule['type']. "\">". $rule['type'];
00115             if ($rule['type'] == 'anchor') {
00116               print " ". $rule['identifier'];
00117             }
00118             print "</td>\n";
00119             if ($has_direction) {
00120                 print "\t<td>". $rule['direction']. "</td>\n";
00121             }
00122 
00123             if (is_array($rule['interface'])) {
00124                 print "\t<td>";
00125                 foreach ($rule['interface'] as $interface) {
00126                     print "\n\t\t". $interface. "<br />";
00127                 }
00128                 print "\n\t</td>\n";
00129             } else {
00130                 print "\t<td>". $rule['interface']. "</td>\n";
00131             }
00132 
00133             print "\t<td>". ($rule['log'] ? "log" : ""). "</td>\n";
00134             print "\t<td>". ($rule['quick'] ? "quick" : ""). "</td>\n";
00135             print "\t<td>";
00136             if (!is_array($rule['proto'])) {
00137                 print $rule['proto'];
00138             } else {
00139                 foreach ($rule['proto'] as $proto) {
00140                     print "\n\t\t". $proto. "<br />";
00141                 }
00142                 print "\n\t";
00143             }
00144             print "</td>\n";
00145             if ($rule['all']) {
00146                 print "\t<td colspan=\"4\" class=\"all\">All</td>\n";
00147             } else {
00148                 if (is_array($rule['from'])) {
00149                     print "\t<td>";
00150                     foreach ($rule['from'] as $from) {
00151                         print "\n\t\t". htmlentities($from). "<br />";
00152                     }
00153                     print "\n\t</td>\n";
00154                 } else if ($rule['type'] == 'anchor'){
00155                   print "\t<td>". htmlentities($rule['from']). "</td>\n";
00156                 } else {
00157                     print "\t<td>". ($rule['from'] ? htmlentities($rule['from']) : "any"). "</td>\n";
00158                 }
00159 
00160                 if (is_array($rule['fromport'])) {
00161                     print "\t<td>";
00162                     foreach ($rule['fromport'] as $port) {
00163                         print "\n\t\t". $port. "<br />";
00164                     }
00165                     print "\n\t</td>\n";
00166                 } else {
00167                     print "\t<td>". $rule['fromport']. "</td>\n";
00168                 }
00169 
00170 
00171                 if (is_array($rule['to'])) {
00172                     print "\t<td>";
00173                     foreach ($rule['to'] as $to) {
00174                         print "\n\t\t". htmlentities($to). "<br />";
00175                     }
00176                     print "\n\t</td>\n";
00177                 } else if ($rule['type'] == 'anchor'){
00178                   print "\t<td>". htmlentities($rule['to']). "</td>\n";
00179                 } else {
00180                     print "\t<td>". ($rule['to'] ? htmlentities($rule['to']) : "any"). "</td>\n";
00181                 }
00182 
00183                 if (is_array($rule['port'])) {
00184                     print "\t<td>";
00185                     foreach ($rule['port'] as $port) {
00186                         print "\n\t\t". $port. "<br />";
00187                     }
00188                     print "</td>\n";

00190                     print "\t<td>". $rule['port']. "</td>\n";
00191                 }
00192             }
00193 
00194             print "\t<td>". $rule['state']. "</td>\n";
00195 
00196             if (isset($has_comment)) {
00197                 print "\t<td style=\"width: 20%\" class=\"rulecomment\">". stripslashes($rule['comment']). "</td>\n";
00198             }
00199         }
00200 
00201         print "\t<td class=\"edit\">";
00202         if ($rule['type'] == 'comment') {
00203           print "\n\t\t<a href=\"commentedit.php?action=filter&amp;rulenumber=$rulenumber\" title=\"Edit Rule\">e</a> ";
00204         } else if ($rule['type'] == 'anchor') {
00205           print "\n\t\t<a href=\"anchoredit.php?action=filter&amp;rulenumber=$rulenumber\" title=\"Edit Rule\">e</a> ";
00206         } else {
00207             print "\n\t\t<a href=\"filteredit.php?rulenumber=$rulenumber\" title=\"Edit Rule\">e</a> ";
00208         }
00209         if ($rulenumber) {
00210             print "\n\t\t<a href=\"". $_SERVER['PHP_SELF']. "?up=$rulenumber\" title=\"Move Rule Up\">u</a> ";
00211         } else {
00212             print "\n\t\t u ";
00213         }
00214         if ($rulenumber != (count($_SESSION['pfw']->filter->rules) - 1)) {
00215             print "\n\t\t<a href=\"". $_SERVER['PHP_SELF']. "?down=$rulenumber\" title=\"Move Rule Down\">d</a> ";
00216         } else {
00217             print "\n\t\t d ";
00218         }
00219         print "\n\t\t<a href=\"". $_SERVER['PHP_SELF']. "?del=$rulenumber\" title=\"Delete Rule\" onclick=\"return confirm('Are you sure you want to delete this Rule?')\">x</a> ";
00220         print "\n\t</td>\n";
00221 
00222         print "</tr>\n";
00223         $rulenumber++;
00224     }
